TopicTitle: Adding two flags to a part?

Articles.Content: So I know how to add a flag to a part, but how do you add two like with the mk2 inline cockpit?

Nevermind - I figured it out. You have to have the two flags where you want them but when you export from your modelling software, join them into one object.

Edited May 2, 2015 by JoePatrick1
